explains: adv. 不加选择地；任意地

sentences.cn: 那些男人不分青红皂白地开枪。

sentences.en: The soldiers fired indiscriminately into the crowd.
sentences.cn: 士兵对着人群胡乱开枪。

sentences.en: Combine this fact with annual government threats to indiscriminately cut reimbursements, physicians are faced with no choice but to increase quantity to boost income.
sentences.cn: 再加上政府每年都威胁要无差别削减费用，医生们别无选择，只能增加药量来增加收入。
